ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule ensures that AML Checkbox and Sign-Off Dates are entered together.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.ProfileId = '00e33000001BhFk', OR( AND( AML__c = TRUE, ISBLANK( AML_Sign_Off_Date__c )), AND ( AML__c = FALSE, NOT(ISBLANK( AML_Sign_Off_Date__c )))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please check the AML checkbox and enter the AML Sign-Off Date to signify completion of AML Process
